subject: Nascar Sprint Cup Series
Automobile Racing
lead_paragraph: Marcos Ambrose, who has been deprived more than once of a Nascar victory, beat Brad Keselowski and Kyle Busch on a two-lap dash to the checkered flag to win at Watkins Glen International.
snippet: Marcos Ambrose, who has been deprived more than once of a Nascar victory, beat Brad Keselowski and Kyle Busch on a two-lap dash to the checkered flag to win at Watkins Glen International.
